message.content:
{"id": "124570", "title": "Bug 124570: Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session", "description": "When using the Preview button on the toolbar, the report that is shown is always the first report opened in the session.", "OB": "", "EB": "To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start BIRT 2.0 RC2, create a project, and import the attached two designs into the project.
2. Open Sales Invoice and click on the Preview button on the toolbar to see the report. Once you have viewed the report, close the viewer.

Actual Result: You see the Product Catalog report again.
Expected Result: You should see the Sales Invoice report.", "SR": "1. Start BIRT 2.0 RC2, create a project, and import the attached two designs into the project.
2. Open Product Catalog and then click on the Preview button on the toolbar to see the report. Once you have viewed the report, close the viewer."}

Open Product Catalog and then click on the Preview button on the toolbar to see the report. Once you have viewed the report, close the viewer.3. '}
